content: **knitted bib for babies in drops babymerino the piece is worked with broken rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern bm-140-by yarn group a ----------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** 1/9 - 9/18 months measurements 12-14 cm mid-front **materials** drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50-50 g colour 43 light sea green drops button no 627 1 item needles drops circular needle size 3 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
